headline: LYTRON RECIRCULATING CHILLER 5,931 WATT
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Baths and Chillers > Recirculating Chillers
specstable:
Manufacturer Lytron
Model RC045J03DD3M205
Cooling System
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Pump type/Model Centrifugal DD 1/2-HP
Cooling Capacity 5,931 W (20,229 BTU/hr)
Minimum Temperature 5 ºC (41 ºF, 278.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 35 ºC (95 ºF, 308 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 0.100 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Interface RS 232
Max Flow 7 GPM (26.60 l/m)
Minimum Pressure 5.000 PSI (344.77 mbar, 34,476.50 Pa)
Maximum Pressure 60.000 PSI (4,137.18 mbar, 413,718.00 Pa)
Capacity/Liquid 22.71 L (6.00 gal)
Compressor Horse Power 1.50 HP
Accessories

Remote Start & Customer Contacts, C to F Display, Calibration Offset, Auto Restart, Over-temperature Fault Indication, Low Temperature Fault Indication, Audible alarm, Fault chiller shutoff, Pressure Units psi or Bar, Anti-Siphon Solenoid to prevent backflow.

Other Information

Power plug HUB-2625 -30-amp-250-volt- female, Return and Supply lines 1/2" npt.

Power Requirements 230 V 17.2 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 21.400 in (54.4 cm)
Depth 27.800 in (70.6 cm)
Height 31.000 in (78.7 cm)
Weight 270 lb (122 kg)
